update tbl_tran
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR},
money = #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

contact_summary = #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_tran set owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expected_date = #{expectedDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=CHAR}, stage = #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=CHAR}, contacts_id = #{contactsId,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_summary = #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, next_contact_time = #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_tran (id, owner, money, name, expected_date, customer_id, stage, type, source, activity_id, contacts_id, create_by, create_time, description, contact_summary, next_contact_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expectedDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{contactsId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=CHAR})

id,

#{owner,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: select tbl_tran.id, u1.name as owner, money, tbl_tran.name, expected_date, c1.name as customer_id, dic1.value as stage, dic2.value as type, dic3.value as source, act.name as activity_id, con.fullname as contacts_id, u2.name as create_by, tbl_tran.create_time, tbl_tran.edit_by, tbl_tran.edit_time, tbl_tran.description, tbl_tran.contact_summary, tbl_tran.next_contact_time from tbl_tran inner join tbl_user u1 on tbl_tran.owner = u1.id inner join tbl_customer c1 on tbl_tran.customer_id = c1.id left join tbl_dic_value dic1 on dic1.id = tbl_tran.stage left join tbl_dic_value dic2 on dic2.id = tbl_tran.type left join tbl_dic_value dic3 on dic3.id = tbl_tran.source left join tbl_activity act on act.id = tbl_tran.activity_id left join tbl_contacts con on con.id = tbl_tran.contacts_id inner join tbl_user u2 on u2.id = tbl_tran.create_by where tbl_tran.id = #{id}
select count(*) as value, dic.value as name from tbl_tran inner join tbl_dic_value dic on dic.id = tbl_tran.stage group by stage
